WorkItem.Description:
Since the update I'm trying to understand why Rawr is showing that my Frostfire gear is better than my Kirin Tor gear.
I don't know if I'm just overlooking something obvious, or I'm just a noob.
Either way this data doesn't make sense and it paints a very different picture than maxdps.com
Â 
Please so me the error of my ways.

Comments.Message: Maxdps should never be used if you care about accuracy. What Rawr is showing you is correct, due to set bonuses involved.
Can you explain a bit more where Rawr is showing you that? For example if I load your profile and look at Shoulders chart I have Kirin Tor higher than Frostfire.

Ok I found the problem you're having. You currently have 3 Kirin Tor pieces and 1 Frostfire. So for the head piece it is choosing between 4 piece T8 and 2 piece T7 bonus. Problem is that you don't have any buffs selected which makes you very mana starved, this is why it prefers the mana gem bonus. The solution is to select the appropriate raid buffs.

Kavan, thanks. That makes a ton of sense. I knew I just needed another pair of eyes to show me where I was messing up.

Thanks
